snippet: At least six people were killed in an attack on a compound in Kabul used by United Nations workers and other foreigners just hours after President Obama's brief visit to the country to sign a security partnership pact.
abstract: At least six people were killed in an attack on a compound in Kabul used by United Nations workers and other foreigners just hours after President Obama's brief visit to the country to sign a security partnership pact.

headline.main: Suicide Attack Follow Obama's Afghanistan Visit

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
